name: TwinStickJukeBox
description:
Goal of the game: Survive while pushing the Payload to the end of the track! Kill your enemies to obtain new weapons! 

Controls:
Keyboard/Mouse:

Shoot: Left click
Aim: Mouse
Walk: A/W/S/D
Dash: Right click
Pick up Weapon: E
Switch Weapon: Q

Controller:

Shoot: Right trigger / R2
Aim: Right Joystick
Walk: Left Joystick
Dash: Left trigger / L2
Pick up weapon: Y / Triangle
Switch Weapon: A / X

To play the game, follow these steps:

1) Download the game
2) Open the file with WinRar
3) Open the folder "TwinStickJukeBox"
4) Start the application "TwinStickJukeBox"

To play our Album:
1) Open the game
2) Go to the Album Select Screen
3) Choose "Payload"
4) Play
